sentences.sContent: Some of these prisoners are extremely dangerous.
sentences.sCn: 这些囚犯中有些极为危险。

sentences.sContent: The powdered milk was not as good as breast milk, and was downright dangerous (= actually dangerous ) when it was mixed with unclean water.
sentences.sCn: 奶粉没有母乳好，用不洁净的水冲调更会造成危险。

sentences.sContent: ...Mount Hua was rarely visited owing to the dangerous paths to the top...
...They are dangerous only if programmers are careless...
...The supervisor of the laboratory is beginning to get headaches and dizzy spells because she says it's dangerous to breathe some of the chemical smoke there...
...That’s OK between sisters but becomes dangerous territory when you’re talking to the children of friends or acquaintances...

trans.tranOther: able or likely to harm or kill you
